title: Hoeing
provenance_text:
Robert Gwathmey [1903-1988], New York, NY; A. C. A. Gallery, New York, NY, by October 1943 [1]; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, January 1944 [2].

Notes:
[1]. As agent. 
[2]. The painting was no.239 (illustrated, plate 2) in the exhibition "Painting in the United States" held at Carnegie Institute, October-December, 1943. The museum purchased the painting from the exhibition. The purchase offer was accepted on December 1, 1943 and the painting was accessioned in January 1944. See copy of correspondence in curatorial file.

creator.birth_place: Richmond (Richmond Indep. City, Virginia, United States)
